question: Where is Odessa located in Ukraine?
true_answer: On the northwestern coast of the Black Sea.
asked_question_translated: Qual é a localização de Odessa na Ucrânia?
answer: Odessa está localizada no sudoeste da Ucrânia, na costa do Mar Negro.
answer_translated_eng: Odessa is located in the south-west of Ukraine, on the Black Sea coast.
